title: The mystery of $MELANIA: First Lady’s memecoin fuels insider windfall
summary: 24 crypto wallets, online accounts capable of purchasing cryptocurrency, bought $2.6 million worth of Melania Trump's memecoin before the token was even announced–netting the insiders an estimated $100 million
